attr.title: Steamworld Heist
attr.desc: In SteamWorld Heist, you command a steam-driven pirate crew in a series of epic tactical shootouts. It’s turn-based strategy with a twist: You manually aim the guns of your robots, allowing for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action!
attr.desc_md: In SteamWorld Heist, you command a steam-driven pirate crew in a series of epic tactical shootouts. It’s turn-based strategy with a twist: You manually aim the guns of your robots, allowing for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action! As the captain you will board, loot and shoot your way through enemy spaceships. Overcome the challenges of the vast frontier by upgrading your recruits with unique abilities, weapons – and even stylish hats!
attr.inst:
Weston32 runtime is required to run this port, install it via Portmaster before running. 
Place the Linux Version of the GOG installer within /steamworldheist/installer/, then just run the game. This will take longer on first startup.
attr.inst_md:
Weston32 Runtime is required to run this port! Install it via Portmaster before running.
* Take the Linux Installer from GOG and place it within /steamworldheist/installer/
* Run the game via your device
(First startup will take longer, wait for 1-2 Minutes)
